revision.text: Possibly: Astro-Theology: or, A Demonstration of the Being and Attributes of God, from a survey of the heavens. Illustrated with copper plates. By W. Derham, Canon of Windsor, Rector of Upminster in Essex, and F.R.S. (London : Printed by W. and J. Innys, Printers to the Royal-Society, at the Prince's Arms at the West End of St. Pauls, MDCCXIX.
